text.p: Is there a quadratic equation of the form [mathjaxinline]y = a + bx + cx^2[/mathjaxinline] satisfied by the four points [mathjaxinline](-2,11), (0,4), (1,2),[/mathjaxinline] and [mathjaxinline](2,1)[/mathjaxinline]?
Enter the correct formula in the form a + b*x + c*x^2 (either exactly or to two decimal places). Remember to use * for multiplication. If there is no such equation, enter the number 0.
